targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "desktops")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice_tls")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -100000000000000s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-authentication")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "login")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-authentication")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "login")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "isardvdi-api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "templates")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ram_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "system" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "cpu_cores"
  )
  |> last()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "system" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "cpu_threads"
  )
  |> last()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r["_value"] * 1024.0 }))
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total"
  )
   |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "system" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "cpu_usage"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /mem_(total|free|cached)/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" )
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    _time: r["_time"],
    _value: 100.0 - (float(v: r["mem_free"] + r["mem_cached"]) / float(v: r["mem_total"]) * 100.0)
  }))
  |> last()
  |> yield()

Desktops = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" 
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, column: "id", fn:(column, tables=<-) => tables 
    |> unique(column: column)
    |> count(column:column),)
  |> rename(columns: {id: "_value"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Desktops:r._value, _time:r._time }))
  |> yield()
Visors = from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Visors:r._value, _time:r._time  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

threads = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" 
  )
  |> findRecord(
    fn: (key) => key["_measurement"] == "system" and key["_field"] == "cpu_threads",
    idx: 0,
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r["_time"], _value: r["_value"] / float(v: threads["_value"])})
  )

host = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" 
  )
  |> findRecord(
    fn: (key) => key["_measurement"] == "hypervisor" and key["_field"] == "mem_total",
    idx: 0,
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total"
  )
   |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r["_time"], _value: r["_value"] / float(v: host["_value"])})
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice_tls")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
